Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬車屋
Entry.EnglishText: Carriage Coach

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: レイ
Entry.EnglishText: Rei

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の子
Entry.EnglishText: Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: トッポ
Entry.EnglishText: Toppo

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋・装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop - Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋・装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop - Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: それにしても、スゴイところに 家を作ったもんだぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: By the way, you've built a house in such a great place!

Entry.JapaneseText: ナニ……アレ？ 岩の中に見えるの…… アレって家かな……？
Entry.EnglishText: What are those? Are those openings in the cliffs supposed to be houses?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうね……岩をくりぬいて 家を作ってるんだわ。 聞いた事はあったけど、 こんなに大きなものだったなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: I believe they are... They carved out the cliffs in order to make their homes. I knew that such a thing existed, but to think that they would be so large...

Entry.JapaneseText: 見て。 これって、鳥よね？
Entry.EnglishText: Look. This is a bird, isn't it?

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ。<Blue>眠れる翼<White>と何らかの 関連があるかもしれんな。 村の人たちに話を聞いてみよう。
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed... Perhaps it may have some connection to the <Blue>Sleeping Wings<White>. Let's see what the villagers know.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんかみんな シュンとしてたネ……
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone seemed pretty dejected back there...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、ピピスタの人たちも 種族について色々考える事が できたんじゃないでしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: But perhaps now they'll be able to think hard about matters concerning race, don't you think?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……俺たちは できるだけの事をした。
Entry.EnglishText: That's right. We did as much as we could.

Entry.JapaneseText: あとは彼ら自身が考え、 解決の道を見つけるしかない。
Entry.EnglishText: If anything changes from here on out, it will be up to the villagers themselves to find a way.

Entry.JapaneseText: よっしゃ！ 他の街へ行こうぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: All right, on to the next town!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どうした、クレア？
Entry.EnglishText: What's wrong, <Claire>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ううん、なんでもない…… なんでもないけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, I'm fine... However...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、もし悩みとか、困った事が あるなら何でも言ってね……
Entry.EnglishText: If there's something bothering you, anything at all, please don't hesitate to tell me, okay?

Entry.JapaneseText: 心配するような事は何もないさ。 オレたちも行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: There's nothing for you to worry about. Let's catch up with the others.

Entry.JapaneseText: う、うん……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, right.

Entry.JapaneseText: 申し訳ありません。 馬車は運休となっております。
Entry.EnglishText: We're truly sorry, but carriages are not available for use at the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>お金が足りないようですね。 馬車のご利用料金は <nmb:12C>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>You seem to be short on money. The fee for using the carriage is <nmb:12C> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>馬車をご利用になりますか？ 料金は定額で<nmb:12C>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>Would you like to use a carriage? The fare is a flat rate of <nmb:12C> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>馬車を利用しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Travel by Carriage? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマル
Entry.EnglishText: Anikamal

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬車に乗らない
Entry.EnglishText: Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエン
Entry.EnglishText: Kyogen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: モクラド
Entry.EnglishText: Mocrado

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>馬車で<unk18:48DC0428B8048880>に移動します。 料金<nmb:12C>ガルド はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000000>To travel to <unk18:48DC0428B8048880> by Carriage, it'll be <nmb:12C> Gald. Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: 捕えたヒューマは 処罰される。
Entry.EnglishText: Any Huma we detain will be punished.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>聖壇<White>に無礼を 働いた者に与えられる 当然の報いだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: It's only fitting for those who would desecrate the <Cyan>shrine<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマが……！ 軽々しく話しかけるな!!
Entry.EnglishText: You're a Huma...! Don't you dare speak to me!

Entry.JapaneseText: ワン！
Entry.EnglishText: Woof!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今晩どうしましょう……
Entry.EnglishText: What should I do...?

Entry.JapaneseText: いえね、酋長がウチを 借りたいって言うから お貸ししたんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, the Chief wanted to borrow our house, so I lent it to him...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今晩寝るところが ないのよねー。
Entry.EnglishText: But now I don't have a place to sleep tonight.

Entry.JapaneseText: スゴイ音……北の方かな…… ラジルダ？ キョグエン？
Entry.EnglishText: What an incredible sound... seems to be from the north... maybe Razilda? Or Kyogen?

Entry.JapaneseText: トッポと一緒にいても 怒られなくなったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm no longer angry whenever I hang out with Topp.

Entry.JapaneseText: でもね、お父さんもお母さんも、 ちょっと困った顔するの。
Entry.EnglishText: But my mom and dad look annoyed whenever they see us together.

Entry.JapaneseText: 決めたの！ みんなが仲良く遊べる村になるように いっぱいがんばるって！
Entry.EnglishText: I've made up my mind! I'll do my best to make this village a place where everyone can live and enjoy life together.

Entry.JapaneseText: ＝＝＝レイ＝＝＝ パラレル終了後にここに配置。
Entry.Notes: Debug line, just leave it marked done please :)

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、メガネをかけた ヒューマの男の人が そこのお家に連れてこられたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Just now, a Huma man with glasses was brought to that house over there.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一緒にいたおじちゃん、 怒ってたけど、 あの人、なんか悪い事したのかなあ……？
Entry.EnglishText: The uncle who was with him looked furious. I wonder if he did something wrong?

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ、<Cyan>聖壇<White>から <Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>が生まれるの？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh, the <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White> hatched on the <Cyan>shrine<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: どんなトリなのかなぁ？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what the bird is like?

Entry.JapaneseText: レイと遊びたいのに。 お母さんが<Red>羽まみれ<White>とは 仲良くしちゃダメだっていうんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I really want to play with Rei. But mom says I can't be friends with <Red>Feathered Gajuma<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: この前まで、 みんな仲良くしてたのに……
Entry.EnglishText: Just the other day, we were getting along just fine...

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう…… お姉ちゃんたちのおかげで レイと遊べるようになったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you... It's thanks to sis here that I can play with Rei again.

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう…… おじさんたちのおかげで レイと遊べるようになったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you... It's thanks to pops here that I can play with Rei again.

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう…… お兄ちゃんたちのおかげで レイと遊べるようになったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you... It's thanks to bro here that I can play with Rei again.

Entry.JapaneseText: お母さんたちは、あんまり いい顔しないけどね……
Entry.EnglishText: Our moms don't seem too happy about it, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かな、この音…… なんかすぐ近くみたい……
Entry.EnglishText: What's that noise...? It sounds like it's right around the corner...

Entry.JapaneseText: ボク、今まであんまり ヒューマの人と会った事 なかったけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I've never really talked to a Huma before...

Entry.JapaneseText: 同じヒトの仲間だよね？ ガジュマもヒューマも 仲間だよね？
Entry.EnglishText: But we're all the same, right? Gajuma and Huma can be friends too, can't they?

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックさんが言ってたよ！ ずーっと昔から、ヒトはみんな 仲間だったって！
Entry.EnglishText: That's what Mr. Hack said! That since long ago, we were all friends!

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクもそう思うんだ！ だから、ハックさんたちと協力して バイラスから村を守るんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I also believe that! That's why we need to work with Mr. Hack and the others to protect our village from the Biruses!

Entry.JapaneseText: この街はヒューマが住むには ちょっとつらいかもね。
Entry.EnglishText: This town might be a bit tough for a Huma to live in.

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、水も少ないし、 岩と砂ばかりの 厳しい環境だから。
Entry.EnglishText: After all, there's not much water here, and the environment is harsh, filled with only rocks and sand.

Entry.JapaneseText: 劣等民のヒューマめが……！ 近付くな！ 今すぐここから立ち去れ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey! A Huma like you can't just waltz on in here!

Entry.JapaneseText: 待ってくれ、オレたちは……
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, we're actually...

Entry.JapaneseText: 劣等民となんかと話したくもない！ 帰れと言ったら帰れ！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't even want to speak with you lowlifes! When I say you can't be here, I mean it!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか、すっごく雰囲気悪いね…… 中で何が起きてるんだろ……
Entry.EnglishText: There's something off about the mood here... I wonder what's going on?

Entry.JapaneseText: ドバル酋長にお会いしたい。 通してもらえないか？
Entry.EnglishText: I'd like to meet with Chief Doval. Could you let us through?

Entry.JapaneseText: そっちの劣等民たちは、 あんたの仲間か？
Entry.EnglishText: Are these Inferiors supposed to be your friends?

Entry.JapaneseText: 劣等民……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Inferiors!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 劣等民を劣等民と呼んで 何が悪い？
Entry.EnglishText: Is there something wrong with calling an Inferior an Inferior?

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく劣等民と つるんでいるようなヤツは 通すわけにはいかん……
Entry.EnglishText: There's no way I'm letting you see the Chief if you're associating with them.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや……この五人は…… んん……
Entry.EnglishText: No, these five here are my... Hm...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の……召使いだ。
Entry.EnglishText: They are my...servants.

Entry.JapaneseText: 召使い？ それにしちゃあ、 ずいぶん態度が大きくないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Servants? Aren't they a little too uppity to be servants?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、俺の言う事は、何でも 聞くよう厳しくしつけてある。
Entry.EnglishText: No, they've been trained to follow whatever orders I give them.

Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、おまえたち？
Entry.EnglishText: Isn't that right?

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、返事をせんか！
Entry.EnglishText: I asked you a question!

Entry.JapaneseText: は、はい……<Eugene>様！
Entry.EnglishText: Y-Yes, Master <Eugene>!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかった。 そういう事なら、そいつらも 一緒に連れて行っていいだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: I see. If that's the case, then you can take them with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……助かる。 では行くぞ、おまえたち。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, thank you. Get moving, everyone!

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺のように角を持つ者こそ、 もっとも優れたガジュマ、 <Red>特等民<White>だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Those of us who have horns are the superior Gajuma, the <Red>special ones<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろんヒューマは劣等民だから 俺たちガジュマがちゃんと 管理しなければならないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Huma are naturally an inferior race, so we Gajuma must properly manage them.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちゃんとご主人様の言う事を 聞くんだぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Be sure to obey your master with diligence.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか騒ぎに なってるみたいだが、 俺はここを離れるわけにはいかないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There seems to be some sort of commotion, but I can't just leave.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマめ…… また、何か争いの種を 運んできたのか？
Entry.EnglishText: You Huma... What trouble did you bring this time?

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺が探しに行ってやっても いいんだが、見張りって 責任重大な仕事があるからな。
Entry.EnglishText: I could go searching for them, but I have my very important job as a lookout.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは ガジュマのために 働いてりゃいいんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma should just serve us Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ご苦労だったな。
Entry.EnglishText: Good job!

Entry.JapaneseText: ドバル様の家の前で 親たちが待っている。 連れていってやってくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: The parents are waiting in front of Chief Doval's house. Please take the children there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのご主人様がいたからこそ、 その子らも見つかったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: It was only because of your master that the children were found.

Entry.JapaneseText: 恩を売るつもりかもしれんが、 そうはいかんぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: You may think you're currying favor with us, but that not going to happen.

Entry.JapaneseText: ドバル酋長の考えは間違ってない。 種族の団結のためには…… 階級も……必要なのだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Chief Doval's ideas are sound. We need a class hierarchy... In order to maintain racial solidarity.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし…… 何か他にも方法は…… あるかもしれない……
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps there might be some other way to maintain it, though...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……種族というのは…… 種族というのは…… 今、考えているところだ……
Entry.EnglishText: What exactly is race...? I'm not sure what to think of it now...
Entry.Notes: Second link is literally: "I'm thinking about it now", but that sounds silly to say it out loud.

Entry.JapaneseText: 他の街での対立が 激しくなっているという。
Entry.EnglishText: The racial conflicts in other cities are intensifying.

Entry.JapaneseText: この村のように、他の種族と 関わらずに暮らすしかない。 酋長は正しいんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: We have no choice but to live separately from other races. The chief is right...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマと関わる気はない。 争いの原因になるだけだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I have no intention of involving myself with a Huma. It will only lead to conflict.

Entry.JapaneseText: イゴルとハックという ヒューマは、一体 どういうつもりなんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What in the world are Igor and Hack up to?

Entry.JapaneseText: 同じヒトの仲間として 協力しあうべきだと……
Entry.EnglishText: We should be working together as fellow human beings...

Entry.JapaneseText: 同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>という種族だと 言うんだ……種族……
Entry.EnglishText: They said that we are all members of the same <Yellow>Human<White> race...

Entry.JapaneseText: 他の街での対立が 激しくなっているという。
Entry.EnglishText: The racial conflicts in other cities are intensifying.

Entry.JapaneseText: この村のように、他の種族と 関わらずに暮らすしかない。 酋長は正しいんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: We have no choice but to live separately from other races. The chief is right...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマと関わる気はない。 争いの原因になるだけだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I have no intention of involving myself with a Huma. It will only lead to conflict.

Entry.JapaneseText: こら！ ヒューマが 勝手に入るな!!
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Huma! You can't just waltz in here!

Entry.JapaneseText: 待て待て、 ちょっと待て。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, hold on, wait a minute.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どうしましょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: What should we do?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……種族間の争いはないみたい ですけど、ガジュマ同士での 争いはあるみたいだし……
Entry.EnglishText: There may be no interacial conflicts here, but it seems as though there's an interracial conflict between the Gajuma.
Entry.Notes: changed racial to species, so that it flows better, but I want it checked. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: でもよぉ、こう取り付くしまも ないんじゃなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, but how are we supposed to fix that when they barely tolerate us already?
Entry.Notes: clunky -dragon. maybe.... "When they barely tolerate us in the first place?"

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hm...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かあったのかな？ 行ってみようよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Did something happen? Let's go check it out!
